Title: Classic Pocket Watch - AKStore - Rabbit Style Delicate Vintage Drink Me Pocke...
Description: Classic Pocket Watch - AKStore - Rabbit Style Delicate Vintage Drink Me Pocket Watch With Chain Highly polished plated chrome. Quartz movement - easy time setting and case release button. Add undeniable style and class to your daily life and fashion with a classic Bronze Pocket Watch White dial with filigreed hour, minute, and second hands on ornate Arabic numerals. Can be worn like a Necklace with a Pendant Occasions for gifts Public relations planning, business gifts, Thanksgiving Day, wedding, Tanabata Festival, Valentine's Day, Birthdays, Christmas, Halloween, dating Few things spark as much personal curiosity from afar as seeing someone casually pulling out a pocket watch. More than for checking the time, this casts an aura of sophistication and confident ease. Vintage pocket watches also make a superb choice for a birthday, Christmas, wedding, or for groomsmen gifts. They are also ideal for corporate gifts or for the retirement of a long-time employee. This classic plated flip-case pocket watch combines vintage tastes with the modern, durable practicality of a quartz movement pocket watch. FEATURES: 1.Brand:AKStore 2.Material:high-quality Bronze 3.Size: approx Watch = 2.7cm X2.7cm, Chain = 78cm (30") 4.Color:Vintage Bronze Weight: 0.03kg/pcs Package include: 1 x Pocket Watch. We use a selection of shipping services such as UPS, FedEx, USPS etc. We only ship to the lower 48 states, no APO/FPO addresses or PO Boxes allowed. Local pickups and combined shipping options are not provided at this time. Return You can return a product for up to 30 days from the date you purchased it. Any product you return must be in the same condition you received it and in the original packaging. Please keep the receipt. General Return Information - If you would like to return your purchased merchandised, please kindly contact us via eBay message by choosing “I have a question about using my item or I want to send the seller a message.” as the topic. We will provide you with the return shipping label with the tracking number to your PayPal email address and the return address confirmation to your eBay message. The location of the warehouse responsible for the return will be determined by the fulfillment service department. Once the item has been delivered, we will issue you the refund for the purchase. You have 30 days grace period after the delivery of the item to complete the return. Return Shipping Costs - We will be responsible for return shipping costs (if any) if the merchandise received is either not as described or damaged in any ways. As for returns due to any other reasons, such as change of mind, mistaken purchases, or buyer’s remorse, you will be responsible for the round trip shipping costs. Restocking fees may also apply at our discretion. Return Locations - Please be informed that our products are being stored and fulfilled by third party warehouses and manufacturers throughout the United States (also known as third party fulfillment or product sourcing). Therefore, the most appropriate return location will be determined by the respective warehouses or manufacturers, depending on your location and product types. Please note that the return shipping location may differ from the return address stored on eBay. Please refer to the return instructions and follow them accordingly to ensure successful return processes.
